alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Carter; Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 5:22PM EST until February 27 at 5:45PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Boyd County in northeastern Kentucky... North central Lawrence County in northeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Carter County in northeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Cabell County in central West Virginia... Northern Wayne County in western West Virginia... * Until 545 PM EST. * At 522 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rush, or 8 miles northwest of Yatesville Lake State Park, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntington, Wayne, Beech Fork State Park, Barboursville, Durbin, Centerville, Burnaugh, Lockwood, Pea Ridge, Lavalette and Buchanan. This includes Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 8 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
